img.style: margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 10px; border-width:1px;padding:3px; max-width:100%

span.style: display: table-caption; caption-side: bottom; font-size: 90%; margin-top: -10px; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

div.font:
The JGSC Board of School Trustees is pleased to announce the appointment of Chris Manering as the next Principal of John Glenn High School, effective July 1, 2020. Mr. Manering is replacing the retiring William Morton. Mr. Manering has served as the Assistant Principal at JGHS since July 2017. He also served as the Athletic Director at John Glenn High School from 2014 until 2017. In addition, Mr. Manering has 11 years of teaching and coaching experience.
In addition, the Board of School Trustees welcomes Ronald Brown to the Assistant Principal position at John Glenn High School, effective July 1, 2020. Mr. Brown comes to us from Elwood Community School Corporation where he served as the Dean of Students and Head Football Coach since January 2019. Previously, Mr. Brown has served as a teacher and coach at Triton Jr-Sr High School and at Centerville High School. Mr. Brown has 13 years of experience in education as a teacher, coach, and as an administrator. Mr. Brown has coached football, wrestling, and basketball, and is licensed in Physical Education Health, and Criminal Justice, as well as Building Level Administration.

img.style: margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 10px; border-width:1px;padding:3px; max-width:100%

span.style: display: table-caption; caption-side: bottom; font-size: 90%; margin-top: -10px; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

div.span: and the Office of School Accountability & Accreditation congratulates John Glenn High School on its 2016-17 A-F school performance! JGHS has received the status of a "Performance Qualified High School" for the 2018-19 school year!

font.br: The John Glenn School Corporation accepts the responsibility to create an educational environment that will challenge, inspire, encourage and support excellence for an ever-changing world. We will provide a student-centered academic atmosphere that will encourage lifelong learning experiences that enable all students to be productive members of their community.
